name: Hole Dash
description:
Play this version of the game, instead of the current one: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1L2FmeYDqokw6Tu2J43KbijSfZNogjBT8/view?usp=shari... 

 In this game you have to shapeshift (literally), to fit through shape specific holes. But, it's not as easy as you may think! As you approach a wall, it's your job to press a key on your keyboard, that is indicated on the wall, to shapeshift. Each time you pass through a wall your score increases. How high can you score? Will you be able to reach 100 and more?

 Hole Dash is a fun little game I made 1 day before the end of the third Brackey's game jam. There might be bugs, so beware. I might continue to work on this project, I really wanted to add sound or music, but I just didn't have enough time.  If you had at least some amount of fun and want me to work on the game more, please do tell me.
